name: com.tomegan.dots.hybridprefabs
description: A package for managing gameobject prefabs via entities.

samples.description: A small example showing basic hybrid prefab usage with a PooledBehaviour
An example showing how hybrid prefabs can read transform data from entities and vice-versa
An example showing how to use the HybridPrefab Monobehaviour to add component objects to an entity and then use them in a system
